text:
@NYGovCuomo Gov Cuomo
So now NYS has low infection rates, how can it be maintained if infected travellers from the high infection states start bringing coronavirus back into New York?
Will we face an outbreak ....and a rerun of the last 2-3 months?
Just thinking...... cheers HJ
